content.rendered:
Our modern, chunky tables are made from solid wood including the table tops. They are stained in either a dark walnut or soft oak finish. 

These chunky dining tables are perfect for use in pubs, clubs, cafes and restaurants. This model has been reinforced by adding a ‘H’ shaped bracing bar at the base. This also can be used as a foot rest.

The chunky tops are 40mm thick. 

This item requires basic self assembly.

Wood stains have a lead time of 10 working days. Painted legs have a lead time of 2-3 working weeks.
